verbose_text: To explore mechanistically how IAV triggered SUMOylation may impact the function of PAF1C, we focused follow-up studies on CDC73 (also known as parafibromin or HRPT2), a core component of PAF1C with SUMO modification sites recently mapped by mass spectrometry, and which our shRNA screening data revealed as a potential host antiviral factor.
evidence: SUMOylation may impact the function of PAF1C
